>
[Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1865) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 153 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Swashbuckler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=43)

**Prerequisites**
[Swashbuckler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1859); expert in Reflex saves

</column>

---

Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.
name: Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)
prerequisite: Swashbuckler Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
